about_the_game:
Roxanne's year with the crew comes to an end. Say your goodbyes to the gang...

Perhaps forever.


Last Act Features
  • 30k story Word Count
  • A CHOICE-BASED STORY driven by YOUR decisions
  • A full gallery of over 35+ CGS (The last act contains the last unlockable 10)
  • 24 Choices (Choose carefully, the choices in this episode contain the most weight, naturally)
Consequences & Story Endings:
  • See the results of your decisions in the finale of the episodic trilogy
  • 5 separate ending for each route

Epilogue Menu (trophy Room):



  • 5 epilogues to unlock that focuses on the years that follow the events of the main story

The Yearbook Menu:



  • Have your yearbook signed by your favorite clique and have a special goodbye moment with them
  • The yearbook menu will allow you to see what your friends left you on the last day of school. You will be able to visit this menu after each of the 5 possible playthroughs to get everyone's possible yearbook signing and scene.


The Last ACT is the final episode in a series of three in total, it's recommended to play all three in order to get the full story

content_descriptors.notes: Possible Trigger warnings: Suggested suicide, Glorification of Fantasy Drugs, Crude humor, Strong language & descriptions violence.
